SEARCH

Class AST

java.lang.Object
ParseTree
AST
public class AST extends ParseTree
Represents an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) for a given parse tree. The AST is generated by removing unnecessary terminals and non-terminals from the parse tree. ASTs can be found in test/ast-2/ for parse tress in test/ast-1/.
